snippet: Several hundred thousand people massed at the Eiffel Tower on Sunday to protest a plan by President François Hollande to legalize gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: Several hundred thousand people massed at the Eiffel Tower on Sunday to protest a plan by President François Hollande to legalize gay marriage.
